Articles.Content:
Hi everyone! I'm Matt, and as you can see I decided to become a part of that awesome society that Kerbonauts are .

I'm a guy from Poland, so I may not speak english correctly, please forgive me if I ever made a mistake.

I'm not great at KSP, but I've been playing it for a while so I hope I'll get better. I love that game, and I love to expand it by adding mods, but my PC can't really handle lot of them for now. Still, I never play without things like Kethane or FAR. As I said, I'm not the best, so I use MechJeb too when I doubt in my skills. (Don't hate me for that )

So, again: Welcome everyone, have a nice day, and may The Kraken be ever in your favour!
Welcome to the forum, MarethyuGamer, and your English is fine. You will also find quite a few of your countrymen already here.
Welcome aboard! Don't worry, the forums here are quite multinational.

Hi! Welcome to the forums.

Your English is not bad, it's good o.o

Also it's not wrong to use MJ.

Welcome MarethyuGamer,

And good flights and explosions to you!
